text: Thomas Higginson may refer to: *Thomas Wentworth Higginson (1823–1911), American author, abolitionist, and soldier *Thomas Higginson (Canadian politician) (1810–1896), Canadian political figure *Thomas Higginson (soldier) (1794–1884), Canadian soldier, civic official and politician *Tom Higgenson of the band Plain White Ts
title: Thomas Higginson
